verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let there be love
shared among us,
let there be love
in our eyes.
May now your love
sweep this nation. Cause us,
O Lord, to arise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Give us a fresh understanding,
brotherly love that is real.
Let there be love shared
among us,
let there be love.
